name: croky
description:
Croky

2D platformer, embark on the adventure of controlling crocodile collect coins and other bonuses and watch out for danger.

Game features:
- Funny character
- 4 bright worlds
- Nice graphics
- 4 types of enemies
- 12 engrossing levels
- boss fights
- Simple controls

Croky Xmas demo

Christmas version, embark on the adventure of controlling crocodile festive collect candy and other bonuses and watch out for danger.

Game features:
- Funny character
- Nice graphics
- 8 engrossing levels
- boss fights
- Simple controls

Controls:

Arrow Keys Left/Right: Move around
Arrow Keys Up and Spacebar: Jump
Z keys: shooting
ESC keys: menu

UPDATED 18/05/17
